mapper.update: update customer_intentions set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intention_name = #{intentionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intention_phone = #{intentionPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, intention_marks_id = #{intentionMarksId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, intention_name, intention_phone, status, intention_marks_id, content from customer_intentions where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, process_user_id, intention_name, intention_phone, status, intention_marks_id, content from customer_intentions
